description: Demolition of existing buildings and the erection of two, 5 storey buildings with one storey link building at ground floor level to provide 36 self contained affordable housing units, (comprising 32 x 1 bed and 4 x 2 bed flats) together with ancillary office, care and support services and communal/cafe facilities.
site_name: St Andrews and St Peters Houses, 108
site_number: St Andrews and St Peters Houses, 108
